name: cosmologist

someone who studies the nature and origin of the universe: Cosmologists have used satellites and probes to help determine the age of the universe.
More examplesFewer examplesCosmologists are beginning to converge on what they call a "standard model" of the universe. Stephen Hawking has been the cosmologist most closely associated in the public mind with the phenomenon of black holes. Cosmologists want to know how much of matter believed to exist in the universe, but yet to be accounted for, can be attributed to neutrinos.James Peebles is a theoretical cosmologist at Princeton University.
